name: one meter
description:
my first "game" ever submitted to itch.io. you have Only One meter for your stamina (sprint, dash, attack) and health together

NB: REAL ROUGH one room. one bugged enemy type. and no respawn function.. probably don't try this if you're looking for something engaging

i'm squarely a beginner but i feel i learned a lot by forcing myself to work on this in most of my free time during this jam. i may have gotten more done if i hadn't wasted hours trying to make a perspective shader for the floor 😓 i'm happy with what little i did come up with, despite some bugs

some textures from sonic robo blast 2, a free and open-source sonic fangame.

SHIFT to sprint (tap to dash)
Z        to attack.
